title: Why is the option to transfer from Brazil to OCE gone?
body:
Hello,

After the patch, the option to transfer from Brazil to OCE is gone, any reason for this riot or will it be coming back in the future?

I go to a university with a lot of Brazilians and we hang out and I have been getting them to transfer their BR account to OCE to play with us locals while they are here studying but now the option is gone and no longer can play with my fellow mates from university. 

Please fix this, they all pay the 2600RP to transfer so I don't see why it has been disabled/removed.

I know transfers don't work when it's during the patching days, but patching is over and the picture to transfer to OCE is completely gone and on the FAQ server transfer page it still says Brazil can transfer to OCE with the cost of 2600rp..

replies.body: Can you confirm or deny if you're able to transfer now, the option should be available now.
It's working now! Thanks so much, will tel them to transfer asap so we can game! Ty again!

Hey there,

This is currently being looked into, will post here again when it is resolved.
